meta.goal: Fix color contrast and theme consistency issues

1_remove_hardcoded_colors.note: Replace all hardcoded blacks/greys with semantic tokens

2_icon_foreground_tokens.note: Icons should use semantic foreground tokens matching their container background

3_button_text_contrast.rule: All buttons must use `text-primary-foreground`  on `bg-primary`  or `bg-secondary`

4_card_headers.rule: Card headers must use `text-foreground`  (never raw black) and adjust opacity for secondary text with `text-muted-foreground`

5_enforce_theme_tokens.rule: Enforce semantic tokens for all fg/bg usage

6_accessibility_check.rule: Run WCAG contrast check for all fg/bg pairs
6_accessibility_check.minimumContrast: 4.5:1 for text, 3:1 for icons and large text
